entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 12:24 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: S 27 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
